underlying_goal: To prepare and refine an application for the Anthropic Fellows program, focusing on content reuse and accurately describing work authorization options.
friction_detail: Claude initially made incorrect claims about company-specific H-1B caps and oversold the user's connections for the UK Global Talent Visa, requiring user correction.
primary_success: Accurately and persuasively articulating the user's complex work authorization situation for both the US (H-1B1) and UK (Global Talent Visa).
brief_summary: The user worked with Claude to prepare an Anthropic Fellows application. The session focused on drafting and iteratively refining the work authorization section to accurately reflect US H-1B1 and UK Global Talent Visa options. Claude incorporated user feedback to correct initial inaccuracies about visa details.
